name: Uch? G?sh?den: Bakuretsu Akindo
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Bakuretsu Akindo Uchuu Goushouden is a sugoroku game (Japanese backgammon) that takes its players to the universe. Gameplay offers a high degree of freedom. Player can choose to make money slowly by taking up ordinary jobs, or take a risk and make a fortune at one stroke.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
